content.text: What are you up to today?
I'm working on a new song! What are you doing?
I'm going to the grocery store, then I'm going to work on a new piece of music.
What kind of music do you write?
I write all kinds of music, but I'm mostly into rock and roll.
I love rock and roll! What is your favorite band?
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorite is probably The Beatles.
The Beatles are great! I love their music.
What is your favorite song by them?
I love "Yesterday." It's such a beautiful song.
I love that song too! It's so sad, but it's beautiful.
Yeah, it's really sad. But it's a great song.
What do you like about writing music?
I love being able to express myself and tell stories through my music.
That's a great way to look at it. I love that too.
What kind of stories do you like to tell in your music?
I like to tell stories about my life and my experiences.
That sounds like it would be really interesting.
It is! I love writing music.
I can tell! You seem really passionate about it.
I am! I love music
